page.title: 15REDBOURN'S LAST 40 YEARS
page.content: {40}years ago Redbourn was a small farming village with a population of about{3,500}people.Many of the buildings which are in the village now did not exist then,especially the housing estate on the west side of the village. The area around the{High Street, {Common and Church End}were the only places people lived. There was no{M1 Motorway}or {by_pass}in those days.The High Street was much busier and the {Railway}carried passengers. Redbourn had many Pubs but some were being altered into other buildings.Many farms have been sold to build houses on. {1953}is one year that really sticks out in the last{40}years. This was the year of the{Queen's { Coronation}.
